question: Some people believe that governments should ban dangerous sports even though others claim they should have the freedom to choose a sport to their liking. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: It is argued by some people that think, The risk games that unsafe should be taken off by authority. Although many people believe that must be chosen by their ability. I strongly agree with this opinion that contributed to be banned by the state.

First of all, in nowadays many kinds of sports has been promoted up by people that who are interested. In spite of not safe in which that person is participating.
